00033        {
00034               MI_INSPECTION_DONE = 0x5af40,
00035               MI_BAD_TASKS_COUNT,

00038 
00039        I_BEGIN_COMPONENT(CInspectionComp);
00040               I_REGISTER_INTERFACE(IInspection);
00041               I_REGISTER_INTERFACE(IInspectionTask);
00042               I_REGISTER_INTERFACE(iproc::ISupplier);
00043               I_REGISTER_INTERFACE(iser::ISerializable);
00044               I_ASSIGN_MULTI_0(m_inspectionsCompPtr, "InspectionTasks", "List of subinspections", true);
00045               I_ASSIGN_TO(m_inspectionModelsCompPtr, m_inspectionsCompPtr, false);
00046               I_ASSIGN(m_generalParamsCompPtr, "GeneralParams", "Optional general parameter set, it will be always serialized", false, "GeneralParams");
00047        I_END_COMPONENT;
00048
